title: STAB ULTRA
long_description: STAB ULTRA helps to maximize the efficiency of non-stabilized chlorine by preventing chlorine loss due to ultraviolet rays. With STAB ULTRA, chlorine will last 3 to 5 times longer in pool water. Its easy-to-use tablets dissolve slowly for longer-lasting action.
short_description: BENEFITS Maintains non-stabilized chlorine in water Dissolves slowly for long-lasting effect FORMATS 1 kg and 4 kg

characteristics.title: Recommended levels
characteristics.text: Keep the stabilizer level within the ideal range of 30 to 50 ppm to maintain chlorine residuals. Levels are determined with a stabilizer test kit.

characteristics.title: Application method
characteristics.text: Place STAB ULTRA in the skimmer basket. Tablets can take up to 72 hours to dissolve completely.

characteristics.title: Instructions
characteristics.text: Adjust stabilizer level as needed according to the application method and recommended dosage. Pool can be used immediately after adding the product.

dosage.specifications: Add one 200 g tablet of STAB ULTRA per 10,000 L of pool water to increase the stabilizer level by 20 ppm.
